diff_act: 2.ensure that updates or revisions are accurately reflected and controlled within the system
3.track all changes made to case definitions and status updates
4.maintain a comprehensive history of changes for accountability and reference

regen.absent_element: explicit tracking of all changes to case records and definitions
regen.new_specification: Systems supporting OM must track all changes to case records and definitions to ensure accountability and transparency.

regen.absent_element: tracking of all changes made to case records and definitions
regen.new_specification: The system should provide comprehensive tracking of all changes made to investigation case records and definitions, maintaining an auditable history of revisions.
The system shall provide mechanisms to track all changes made to case records, case definitions, and status updates to ensure accountability and historical accuracy.

label: Systems supporting OM should track the changes made to the status of case records as a result of changes in the case definition.
absence: action of tracking changes made to the status of cases records
